channel.title: [PI] NPC & Trading Problems
channel.description:
Just a little help, I made some new shops; Shop = 11, Shop = 12, and Shop = 13. Ok so I go trade the shopkeepers for Shops 12 & 13 and i can buy the items. But when I click on shop number 11, it won't let me buy any items, it still says "This item costs 187k" but why won't it let me buy it?
Another Question: When I'm trading a person and try to click "offer all" or "Remove all" I get this message saying 'You can't store items while trading!' and it won't let me put the item in, how do I fix this?
I will Rep++, Thanks.

item.title: [PI] NPC & Trading Problems
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

Just a little help, I made some new shops; Shop = 11, Shop = 12, and Shop = 13. Ok so I go trade the shopkeepers for Shops 12 & 13 and i can buy the items. But when I click on shop number 11, it won’t let me buy any items, it still says “This item costs 187k” but why won’t it let me buy it?

Another Question: When I’m trading a person and try to click “offer all” or “Remove all” I get this message saying ‘You can’t store items while trading!’ and it won’t let me put the item in, how do I fix this?

I will Rep++, Thanks.
